channel.title: Two-Pointer on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Two-Pointer on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 82 Remove Duplicates From Sorted List II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 82 Question Given the head of a sorted linked list, delete all nodes that have duplicate numbers, leaving only distinct numbers from the original list.

item.title: Problem 24 Swap Nodes in Pairs
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 24 Question Given a linked list, swap every two adjacent nodes and return its head.

item.title: Problem 350 Intersection of Two Arrays II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 350 Question Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return an array of their intersection.

item.title: Problem 633 Sum of Square Numbers
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 633 Question Given a non-negative integer c, decide whether there are two integers a and b such that a^2 + b^2 = c.

item.title: Problem 75 Sort Colors
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 75 Question Given an array nums with n objects colored red, white, or blue, sort them in-place so that objects of the same color are adjacent, with the colors in the order red, white, and blue.

item.title: Problem 344 Reverse String
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 344 Question Write a function that reverses a string.
